decoder.name: cisco-ssh-reject
decoder.regex: %AAA-W-REJECT: New ssh connection, source ([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+) destination ([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+)\s*R> srcip, dstip

decoder.name: cisco-aaa-cli-ssh
decoder.regex: %AAA-I-CONNECT: User CLI session for user (\S+).*?, source (\S+) destination (\S+) ([A-Z]+)

decoder.name: cisco-aaa-connect
decoder.regex: %AAA-I-CONNECT: New (\S+) connection for user (\S+), source (\S+) destination (\S+) ([A-Z]+)
